item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PSA: SQLite does not do checksums (85 points | 49 comments)
2. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (183 points | 48 comments)
3. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (132 points | 31 comments)
4. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (495 points | 65 comments)
5. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (99 points | 26 comments)
6. Texture-Less Text Rendering (103 points | 33 comments)
7. Mitochondria Are Alive (553 points | 351 comments)
8. Memories are not only in the brain, human cell study finds (54 points | 18 comments)
9. The Saturn V FUELDRAULIC Gimbal System (1963) (16 points | 3 comments)
10. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (84 points | 45 comments)
11. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (542 points | 175 comments)
12. In Memory of Stiver (424 points | 52 comments)
13. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (233 points | 90 comments)
14. Scientist treated her own cancer with viruses she grew in the lab (65 points | 31 comments)
15. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (495 points | 101 comments)
16. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (110 points | 24 comments)
17. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (90 points | 16 comments)
18. Segmenting Credit Card Customers with K-Means: A Fun Dive into Clustering (30 points | 12 comments)
19. Lynis – Security auditing and hardening tool, for Unix-based systems (25 points | 3 comments)
20. Money was never the end goal – mrdoob – threejs creator (78 points | 19 comments)
21. Making Electronic Calipers (154 points | 57 comments)
22. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (67 points | 42 comments)
23. Why Pg_dump Is Amazing (23 points | 2 comments)
24. Iterative α-(de)blending and Stochastic Interpolants (7 points | 1 comment)
25. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (222 points | 53 comments)
26. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (290 points | 175 comments)
27. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (301 points | 92 comments)
28. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (23 points | 5 comments)
29. Python Logic Simulation Library (83 points | 4 comments)
30. Cache Directory Tagging Specification (2004) (11 points | 4 comments)
